description: The OR_LOG_QUEST_ANS table contains questionnaire answers for OR management system surgeries.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the log answer associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IS_USER_ADDED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the questionnaire was added by the user. Y indicates that the questionnaire was added by the user. A null value indicates that the questionnaire was automatically associated with the surgical log. An N will not be populated for this column.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
